products.name: Organic Apple
products.description: Fresh and natural apples grown without pesticides.

products.description: Juicy and ripe bananas, rich in vitamins and essential nutrients, perfect for a healthy snack.

products.name: Natural Bread
products.description: Whole grain bread made without additives, providing energy to fuel your day.

products.description: Peanut butter with no preservatives or added sugars, rich in protein and healthy fats.

products.name: Organic Orange Juice
products.description: Organic orange juice with a rich taste, made from ripe oranges with no added sugar.

products.name: Organic Carrots

products.name: Cheese
products.description: Smooth and flavorful cheese, ideal for adding to dishes or enjoying on its own.

products.name: Fresh Cucumber
products.description: Crisp and fresh cucumbers, packed with vitamins, perfect for salads and snacks.
